location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from John Macleod, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushere [Bushire]

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: Some of the ink in this item has faded and obscured some of the text. Some of the content is therefore difficult to read.

mods.abstract: The letter is missing the opening section, along with the address. So the recipient of the letter is unknown. It concerns an unknown native agent that William Bruce has suggested may be interested in an unknown post.
